abstract: Wells Fargo has fired a senior vice president after investigating reports she held lavish parties at a foreclosed beachfront Malibu house owned by the bank.
snippet: Wells Fargo has fired a senior vice president after investigating reports she held lavish parties at a foreclosed beachfront Malibu house owned by the bank.
lead_paragraph: Wells Fargo has fired a senior vice president after investigating reports that she held lavish parties at a foreclosed beachfront house in Malibu owned by the bank, Reuters reported.

headline.main: Wells Fargo Fires Executive Over Malibu House Scandal
